resources.string: Youtube Initialization failed: Unable to play video
My Local Lists (Tap to Add / Remove)
My TMDb Lists (Tap to Add / Remove)
This user name is too short

To get more out of this application, please login with your TMDb credentials and enjoy TMDb experience. This will let you do things like rate movie, access your TMDb lists, add movies to your TMDb lists or delete movies from your TMDb lists. If you do not have a TMDb account then click on SIGN UP and create an account.
You have successfully logged in to TMDb account
You have successfully logged out from TMDb account

The app is absolutely free and contains no Ad. If you like this app and would want to give the developer a big thumbs up then do so by making a small donation by visiting any of the sites from the below list or any other charity or NGO you wish. Please do not forget to mention your donation in the comment section of the Google Play Store, it will motivate the developer to develop more free apps and surely inspire others to donate. Thanks for your donation.
No movie found for search query %1$s
No internet connection is available and the application does not work properly without internet connection.
You are online on Mobile data and you selected to use ONLY WiFi in settings to download data. The application needs an active internet connection to function properly.
Do you want to update the rating value to TMDb?

This movie is present in your TMDb Rated movie list. To update the TMDb rating value click OK (recommended). Otherwise this rating will be overwritten by your TMDb rating when you will browse this movie next time.
Please set your rating first then try to add the movie to your TMDb Rated list.
The movie is already in TMDb Rated list, to update the rating please change the rating.
Not able to perform the action. Please logout and login again to your TMDb account, then retry.
Recommended movies will be shown on Home screen
Recommended movies will not be shown on Home screen
Images and videos will not be downloaded and Dynamic Theme will not work (not recommended)
All data including images and videos will be downloaded and Dynamic Theme will also work (recommended)
Selected operation cannot be performed now
You are online bon Mobile data and you selected WiFi ONLY in settings to download data.
You have selected Reduced data use in settings, so no images or videos are being downloaded.
No internet connection available, cannot connect to the server.
Application has no internet connection. So the operation cannot be performed now.
Cannot perform the operation, please try again later
Login failed, please ensure the user name and password are correct before re-try
Insufficient space, cannot save the image
Please grant write permission to save images.
Application does not have write permission to save images to your phone
Please try once the movie data is fully loaded
Please try once the collection data is fully loaded
User Tmdb watch list image button
This filter only considers movies for which details have been browsed and viewed
